title: Non-Toxic Holiday Gift Guide - Non-Toxic Holiday Gift Ideas For Toddlers
author: Go New Mommy
description: Check out 30 non-toxic holiday gift ideas for toddlers. They are all made of natural, organic or non-toxic materials that are safe for toddlers.
cleaned_text: This post contains affiliated links. Please read my [disclosure page](https://gonewmommy.com/disclosure-policy/). For this holiday season, I have gathered the best non-toxic products for toddlers as a holiday gift here. They all have the best ingredients, materials that are natural, organic or non-toxic. Give the gift of health and well-being. Toddlers will love these gifts! Oxo Tot Fork And Spoon Set [Oxo Tot Fork And Spoon Set](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B017DTDR64/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B017DTDR64&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=1222f10620261167caf3641ef7200213) is made from stainless steel. (except handles) It is BPA, phthalate and pvc free. There are two sets of fork and spoon in the set. The non-slip handles make it easy for toddlers to hold the spoon and fork. Different colors are also available. Kiddobloom Early Toddler Stainless Steel Utensil Set [Kiddobloom Early Toddler Stainless Steel Utensil Set](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B075F2Q819/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B075F2Q819&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=660d3e446df55508ec4c8c4ae261f914) is made from high grade AISI #304 stainless steel. AISI #304 stainless steel makes the flatware more rust-resistant compared to AISI #200 stainless steel. This utensil set is also lead free, BPA free, cadmium free and phthalate free. A Baby's Gift Board Book Set [A Baby's Gift Board Book Set](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0694016381/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=0694016381&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=950cc49b47e8a40c960cb861adbbe079) includes Goodnight Moon and The Runaway Bunny. Goodnight Moon has been a very popular bed time classic for last 60 years. Babies and toddlers love this book! Haba My Very First Games First Orchard Cooperative Game Haba uses wood from sustainable forestry in German forests. (beech and birch wood) Their toys also uses non-toxic finish and solvent-free paints or water-based stains. [Haba My Very First Games First Orchard Cooperative Game](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004BW8TYC/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B004BW8TYC&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=e2357e7044102af47dfb043e44bc6474) is made in Germany and has been popular for over 30 years. It encourages shape and color recognition and understanding of rules. It is fun and educational! Eco-Kids Eco-Dough [Eco-Kids Eco-Dough](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001Q5EXTM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B001Q5EXTM&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=fda91a76008dacc9cd13925f3e3ab45d) is made from non-toxic, all natural ingredients including plant, fruit and vegetable extracts. What kid doesn't love play-dough? Non-Toxic Holiday Gift - ezpz Happy Mat [ezpz Happy Mat](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00PL1KV70/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00PL1KV70&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=a5e67ba5e81ab9584b08fb885c0c1e65) is made from high quality silicone that is BPA, BPS, PVC, latex and phthalate free. Placemat suctions to any flat surface. It also promotes self-feeding and develops baby's fine motor skills. This is also super easy to clean! The mat also comes in different colors. Ecolunchbox Kid's [Ecolunchbox Kid's Tray](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B007MAY9K8/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B007MAY9K8&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=5d5da24b41c69a2299c3de186b2c541e) is made from 100% high-quality, food-safe stainless steel. It is independently tested lead free. It is also BPA-free and phthalate-free. Stainless steel is one of the safest material for food. Thermos Foogo Sippy Cup [Thermos Foogo Sippy Cup](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00KXY8O24/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00KXY8O24&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=122d29e0e1c136badb90371b166f6f75) BPA-free, double wall stainless steel. Its Thermos Vacuum insulation technology keeps drink cold and fresh for up to 10 hours. Different colors are also available for this cup. Pura Kiki Straw Cup [Pura Kiki Straw Cup](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01N23S4GH/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B01N23S4GH&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=2f09755c10d0ca97413641d1aa1377be) is made from a food-grade #304 stainless steel (18/8). It also features medical grade silicone straw, travel cover and silicone sleeve. There is no plastic parts at all! There is no BPA, bps, EA, PVC, phthalates, or other toxins. Their lids, silicone straws, nipples, spouts are interchangeable with their different size cups. Therefore, simply replace the silicone top as your child grows. There are several different color cups to choose from. Redmond Earthpaste Natural Non-Fluoride Toothpaste 4 Pack [Redmond Earthpaste Natural Non-Fluoride Toothpaste](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00BCRD9V2/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00BCRD9V2&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=f1a9df4fe75210b9a8a21dbf54668c91) is made from only 5 natural ingredients. Ingredients include purified water, bentonite clay, xylitol, spearmint (lemon twist, peppermint, or cinnamon) essential oil, sea salt, tea tree oil. There is no glycerin, SLS or other foaming agents that other toothpaste usually have as their ingredients. This toothpaste can be used for not only baby but for whole family. Honeysticks 100% Pure Beeswax Crayons [Honeysticks 100% Pure Beeswax Crayons](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01GSY9MD2/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B01GSY9MD2&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=430cdf1c54f955bf0fe5b7085d3ec1af) are handmade from 100% pure New Zealand beeswax with non-toxic pigments. There are no paraffin wax or cheap fillers in them. They are designed so that it is hard for kids to break them. There are 12 colors and thinner version crayons are also available. The crayons have honey scent. Green Toys Wagon Outdoor Toy [Green Toys Wagon Out Door Toy](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B06W9JVM1B/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B06W9JVM1B&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=5fdd4794257fa819db2e122552a6ca96) is made from 100% recycled plastic and is made in USA. It's great for both indoor or outdoor play with no metal axles or external coatings. Your toddler will love to give a ride to her teddy bear and pull this wagon. Green Toys Ferry Boat With Mini Cars Bath Toy [Green Toys Ferry Boat With Mini Cars](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00BN6QAVI/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00BN6QAVI&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=9f7dafd05c930fa11c124f62204fa29f) are made from 100% recycled plastic and are made in USA. (#2 plastic) There is no BPA, phthalates, PVC, or external coatings. This set includes a ferry boat and 2 mini cars. Toddler will have so much fun playing with a floating ferry and cars during bath! Plan Toys Assorted Fruits And Vegetables [Plan Toys Assorted Fruits And Vegetables](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000I8UK04/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B000I8UK04&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=671d66b05ae0d45d65286bf36d82253e) are made from all natural, organic, recycled rubber wood and are made in Thailand. Plan Toys use non-toxic, water-based dyes for colors and water-based, formaldehyde-free glue. The set includes an apple, pear, orange, banana, cucumber, mushroom, carrot, knife and natural wood tray. Fruits fit together with Velcro. Hape Walk Along Wooden Pull Toy [Hape Walk Along Wooden Pull Toy](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B008E190RG/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B008E190RG&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=f3caa9effd0fb5e75ccbf391c1cc8a8a) is made from wood sourced from sustainable forests. It has non-toxic finish. Hape uses solvent-free paints or water-based stains for colors. Toddlers will love taking this silly pup on walks. Plan Toys Tea Set [This Plan Toys Tea Set](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001D1IXR2/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B001D1IXR2&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=17c6d0eca7a33c171838886a7913e409) is so adorable! It is made from rubber trees. Plan Toys use non-toxic, water-based dyes for colors and water-based, formaldehyde-free glue. Green Toys Tea Set [Green Toys Tea Set](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001543YEY/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B001543YEY&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=39a396194c8b6ba75f79c3beb66393b2) is made from recycled plastic milk jugs. #2, 4, 5 are the safest plastics and Green toys uses #2 plastic. Green toys are made in USA. This tea set includes a tea pot with lid, sugar bowl with lid, creamer, four cups, four saucers and four teaspoons. It meets FDA food contact standards. Different color is also available. Green Toys Cookware And Dining Set [Green Toys Cookware And Dining Set](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0015466LM/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B0015466LM&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=bdbd337e9f47e7acaaba625ab41498f2) is also made from recycled plastic milk jugs. (#2 plastic) This set comes with a stock pot and lid, a skillet, four plates, four bowls, four cups, and four place settings for fork or spoon or knife. It is made in USA and meets FDA food contact standards. Your toddler will be busy cooking and serving with these toys. Wonderworld Rainbow Sound Blocks - Stackable Hollow Shape Block Toys [Wonderworld Rainbow Sound Blocks](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00005BHUU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00005BHUU&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=8954b31f4898fac1a316cfd1b440f137) are made from environmentally friendly rubberwood. It also uses non-toxic paints, dyes, lacquers and formaldehyde free glue. The blocks are hollow and filled with beads that makes different sounds. Toddler will love stacking these blocks! It won awards as a winner of the Silver Practical Pre-School Award in 2006, and National Parenting Publications Award in 2001. Apple Park Organic Plush Baby Girl With Bunny Booties [Apple Park Organic Plush Baby Girl With Bunny Booties](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01DL1N91Q/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B01DL1N91Q&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=0f1802cc5db2cb4c628007565710b85c) is made from 100% certified organic cotton. It is also made with OEKO-TEX 100 eco-friendly fabric dyes. This is a great alternative to pvc (vinyl) dolls you usually see at the store. If you want to avoid a conventional baby doll that off-gasses phthalates, this doll will be awesome. Removable pink organic cotton velour onesie and organic cotton diaper is secured with soft baby velcro. There is also a baby boy version. Uncle Goose Classic ABC Blocks With Pull Wagon [Uncle Goose Classic ABC Blocks With Pull Wagon](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00000J50C/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00000J50C&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=e0a20c595ee00266aaec17b534613955) is handcrafted from sustainable Michigan basswood. Alphabets, numbers and colors are also printed using non-toxic, mouth safe inks. One side has numbers and one side has alphabets. Toddlers can load up the wagon and make deliveries for fun. Toddlers can also stack or line up blocks and become familiar with letters and numbers. Plan Toys Kitchen Set [Plan Toys Kitchen Set](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00I3VWMOU/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00I3VWMOU&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=612a39505b3657bc1faafd544ab894fd) is made from sustainable rubber wood and coated with a non-toxic finish and vegetable dye. Cooking pans and spatula are included in this kitchen set. What a lovely holiday gift for a toddler! Hape Scoot Around Kid's Wooden Ride On Balance Bike [Hape Scoot Around Kid's Wooden Rice On Balance Bike](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00BHEEHP2/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00BHEEHP2&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=29a17b918842c6cf5cf64197e3f20dfb) is made with wood sourced from environmentally sustainable forests. Hape uses non-toxic, water-based, solvent-free lacquers and non-toxic water-based paints. Toddlers love riding a bike and will be so excited to play with this toy. Keet Premium Organic Children's Chair [Keet Premium Organic Children's Chair](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B01868XACW/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B01868XACW&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=bb0b87c7bf8f01b39f1e11a50351dd64) is made from 100% Organic Cotton Twill. The legs are made from 100% wood with gliders. The chair has strong wood frame covered with high density foam. It contains no flame retardant chemical. Pillow is included. This is a very comfortable, good-looking chair! Different colors are also available. EverEarth Garden Activity Cube [EverEarth Garden Activity Cube](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0050UF5BY/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B0050UF5BY&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=5a39748d44bc3012855a08c58e387978) is made from natural hardwood (high quality 100% FSC certified Beech wood) and stained with non-toxic water-based paint. This activity cube has 6 sides of activities such as sorting, counting beads, sliding animals, spinning gears and a wire bead maze on top. Activity cube helps toddler develop thinking skills, problem skills, etc. It is a great educational toy. Hape Country Critters Wooden Activity Cube [Hape Country Critters Wooden Activity Cube](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B00DUDSU7O/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B00DUDSU7O&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=2a6cfd1e412a06bbdb7dd83edbf22d30) is with wood sourced from environmentally sustainable forests. Hape uses non-toxic, water-based, solvent-free lacquers and non-toxic water-based paints. Four sides features inserting shapes, guiding favorite friends through a maze, spinning, and more. Toddlers will be engaged and entertained with things they can do with this activity cube. Hape Wonder Walker Push and Pull Toddler Walking Toy [Hape Wonder Walker Push and Pull Toddler Walking Toy](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B006WZNXBA/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B006WZNXBA&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=f02481b1833d689cd8b9a7be53a03039) is with wood sourced from environmentally sustainable forests. Hape uses non-toxic, water-based, solvent-free lacquers and non-toxic water-based paints. Moveable knobs, gears, and colorful balls offer five different activities. Toddlers just love pushing and pulling walkers and this is a perfect toy for it! They can also bring along objects while walking with this walker. Grimm's Large 12-Piece Rainbow Stacker - Wooden Nesting Puzzle [Grimm's Large 12 piece Rainbow Stacker](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B0089VP95S/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B0089VP95S&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=1c3d8cc059c71ad907739a77375c20ba) is handmade in Germany. It is made from a single, solid piece of linden wood. It also has certified non-toxic, child-safe water based stains. No paint or varnish is used. Toddler can use this as a stacker, a puzzle or a toy as bridges, tunnels, fences, etc. Hape Wooden Doll House [Hape Wooden Doll House](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005QZLBXO/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B005QZLBXO&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=d94a7dac29a16dca41d9ce4e45631758) is made with wood sourced from environmentally sustainable forests. Hape uses non-toxic, water-based, solvent-free lacquers and non-toxic water-based paints. Who wouldn't love this doll house? Maple Landmark Name Train Town Set [Maple Landmark Name Train Town Set](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000EGIDX6/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B000EGIDX6&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=ce76a7d334bc0a0fb997753f943296fb) is made from New England maple solid wood and finished with non-toxic paints and finishes. Connections are made with strong, safe and simple magnets. Camden Rose Child's Cherry Wood Play Kitchen With Hutch [Camden Rose Child's Cherry Wood Play Kitchen With Hutch](https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000W0DIGG/ref=as_li_tl?ie=UTF8&camp=1789&creative=9325&creativeASIN=B000W0DIGG&linkCode=as2&tag=gonewmommy08-20&linkId=606c20d63ae0d9de704b49c4a32edb1a) is such a beautiful kitchen. It is made from solid cherry hard wood with walnut and birch accents. Removable kitchen sink is heavy gauge stainless steel. This kitchen is finished with Three BEEautitul Bees Original Wood Polish. (blend of beeswax and USDA certified organic Jojoba oil or food-grade mineral oil. Their mineral oil is tested to be safe. ) Toddlers will want to play with this kitchen every day.
